snippet.title: Adore - Early Access Release Trailer (Monster taming action roguelite)
snippet.description:
Adore is a monster taming action roguelite game developed by Cadabra Games. 

If you want to be part of the development, during the Early Access process, all you need to do is share your critiques and suggestions with us. We will make sure to listen to what you have to say!

Steam Store:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1074620

Join our Discord Community: 
https://discord.gg/9C8B2hK

Social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CadabraGames
Facebook: https://facebook.com/CadabraGames
Instagram: https://instagram.com/CadabraGames

#playadore #earlyaccess #roguelite
